summary:
Money-Making Products - Products in this segment are custom solutions to facilitate making money in the cryptocurrency market.

 FMD Token - FMD is a community utility token that is used across all ecosystem products.

 Burning - Burning is the process of disposing of a certain number of FMD in order to reduce their supply and increase demand. Burning contributes to our tokenomics deflationary mechanism.

 Educational Products - The educational segment of our ecosystem is focused on community development and helps people navigate the demanding FinTech and Blockchain environment.

 Founders Fund - Falcon Mars DAO Founders Investment Fund. Helps provide liquidity, access to a loyal audience, technical expertise, audits, and legal structuring.

 Infrastructure Products - The Falcon Mars DAO infrastructural segment helps users navigate our ecosystem.

 FMD LifeStyle - FMD LifeStyle allows receiving discounts on Falcon Mars DAO and partner products by holding FMD.

 New Products - In this section, you will find new Falcon Mars DAO ecosystem products that are currently under development or about to be launched.

 Falcon Mars DAO Partners - Information about Falcon Mars DAO collaborations. We are open to all kinds of partnerships, from informational to technological collaborations.

 Genuine Web3 Solutions - Falcon Mars DAO is a Web3 community of users of educational, infrastructureand decentralized deflationary products, powered by its native FMD token.
